name: Summit Hotel Properties, Inc.
description: Summit Hotel Properties, Inc. is a publicly traded real estate investment trust (REIT) that focuses on the acquisition, ownership, and leasing of premium-branded, select-service hotels in the United States. The company was founded in 2011 and operates a portfolio of hotels under renowned brands such as Marriott, Hilton, and Hyatt. Summit Hotel Properties aims to provide attractive returns to its shareholders through a combination of capital appreciation and income generation. The company strategically targets markets with strong demand drivers, including urban centers and business districts, to maximize occupancy rates and revenue. Summit is committed to sustainability and operational efficiency, implementing environmentally-friendly practices across its portfolio. With a focus on disciplined capital allocation and strong management, the company continues to expand its footprint in the hospitality industry, offering well-located properties that meet the evolving needs of travelers. As travel rebounds post-pandemic, Summit Hotel Properties is well-positioned to capitalize on growing demand for hotel accommodations and enhance shareholder value.

seo.meta_title: Summit Hotel Properties, Inc. | Premier Hospitality REIT
seo.meta_description: Explore Summit Hotel Properties, Inc., a leading hospitality REIT focused on premium-branded hotels. Learn about our portfolio, mission, and commitment to sustainability.

faq.question: What type of properties does Summit Hotel Properties invest in?
faq.answer: Summit Hotel Properties invests in premium-branded, select-service hotels.

faq.question: When was Summit Hotel Properties founded?
faq.answer: Summit Hotel Properties was founded in 2011.

faq.question: Where is Summit Hotel Properties headquartered?
faq.answer: Summit Hotel Properties is headquartered in Austin, Texas, USA.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Summit Hotel Properties?
faq.answer: Daniel P. Wurzbacher is the CEO of Summit Hotel Properties, Inc.
